FuncDef:
The mtu command configures an MTU for an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The undo mtu command restores the default MTU.
By default, the MTU configured for the outbound interface is used in SR forwarding.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an MTU for an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The value is an integer ranging from 512 to 9600, in bytes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure an MTU for an SR-MPLS TE Policy, run the mtu command. The effective MTU of a forwarding path is the minimum MTU among the physical outbound interfaces of all devices on the path. In service planning, ensure that the MTU to be configured for an SR-MPLS TE Policy is not greater than the effective MTU of the forwarding path.
